analyzed: dga' ba bzhi rim gyis skye ba ni gang gi sbyor ba byed pa ste 'di ni dgos pa'o //

analyzed: sems kyi dri ma 'khru ba dang // sdig pa dag pa nus pa'o //

analyzed: zhes pa / shes rab ye shes kyi nus pa'ang sems kyi dri ma 'khru bar byed pa'o //

analyzed: gzhan yang / sa la mngon du phyogs pa dang // 'og ma'i sdig pa sbyor ba dang / gong dang gong la gnas byed pa //

analyzed: 'di ni nus pa zhes su bshad //

analyzed: ces pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o ;

analyzed: /'o na de la man ngag bstan par bya ba gang yin zhe na / 'khor lo pho nya'i sbyor ba rnams //

analyzed: mkhas pas gang 'phrod de la bstan //

original: zhes pa 'di ni 'khor lo la sogs pa gang zhig gis snod brtags te /

analyzed: gcig dang gnyis dang bcu dang bcu drug gi bar du dang / pho nya mo'i rigs du ma la brten nas /

analyzed: byang chub sems kyi bde ba nyams su myong bar byed pa 'di lta bu'i man ngag bstan par bya'o //

analyzed: brten nas ye shes skye ba yin //

original: zhes pa zab pa'i tshogs ni rig ma la brten pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa zab pa'i tshogs ni rig ma la brten pa ste /

analyzed: 'di yis de'i dga' ba la sogs pa ji bzhin du 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi man ngag brten par bya'o //
translated: One should rely on the intimate instruction of the assembly of the arising of the joy, and so on, of that.

original: 'o na dngos grub gang dang 'brel zhe na //
analyzed: 'o na dngos grub gang dang 'brel zhe na //

analyzed: gang zhig 'di yis byed pa yin //

analyzed: de 'ang rnal 'byor gang dang 'brel ba yin zhe na /

analyzed: gang zhig 'di la rtag gnas pa //

analyzed: zhes pa gang zhig rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang nye bas 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: One who abides in the completion stage is the yoga of the completion stage through proximity.

original: de 'ang rgyud gang dang 'brel pa yin zhe na //üîΩ'di yis zab pa ston pa yi //
analyzed: de 'ang rgyud gang dang 'brel pa yin zhe na // 'di yis zab pa ston pa yi //

analyzed: rgyud rnams kun la brten par bya // zhes pa gang zhig gis 'di la gnas nas 'di thob par 'dod pas /

analyzed: 'di nye bar ston pa'i rgyud rnams la brten pa dang gnas par bya'o //

analyzed: 'di la gnas pa'i gang zag gis // thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa //
translated: The person who abides in thisüîΩshould rely on the tantras

original: zab pa ston pa'i rgyud rnams la //
analyzed: zab pa ston pa'i rgyud rnams la //

original: brten dang mnyan dang bshad par bya //
analyzed: brten dang mnyan dang bshad par bya //

original: zhes pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //

analyzed: de ltar shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba rgyas par bshad nas //

analyzed: gang zhig bzhi pa'i ngo bo ni //

analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i 'bras bur gyur pa gang yin pa de bzhi pa'o //

original: 'di'i dbye ba'ang du zhig ce na /
analyzed: 'di'i dbye ba'ang du zhig ce na /

analyzed: rten can dang ni rten med kyi // bzhi pa'i dbang ni gnyis su shes //

analyzed: zhes pa gang rig ma dang ma bral ba'i dus na ye shes skyes pa de ni rten can gyi bzhi pa'o //

analyzed: rten med kyi bzhi pa ni rig ma la brten pa'i phyis gang gi man ngag las @222b skyes pa'i ye shes te /

original: 'di ltar gnyis pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar gnyis pa kho na'o //

original: 'di ci'i phyir bzhi pa zhe na /

analyzed: gang du gsum ba las gzhan phyir //

original: zhes gsum pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsum pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is beyond the third,

original: bzhi pa dang ni mthar thug pa //
analyzed: bzhi pa dang ni mthar thug pa //

analyzed: mchog dang bla med rnam grangs so //

analyzed: zhes pa gsum pa las 'das pa nyid dang / khyad par can yin pa'i phyir dang / gong na med pa nyid 'di ni rnam grangs so //

analyzed: 'o na chos gang du dang ldan zhe na /

analyzed: gang zhig / sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang // ldan pa 'di ni bzhi pa'i dbang //

analyzed: zhes bshad pa spyi'i chos so //

analyzed: bye brag gi chos ni gsal ba dang bde ba dang mi rtog pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //

analyzed: gzhan sel ba zhes bya ba'ang gang yin zhe na /

analyzed: dngos po'i rtog las byung ba'i chos //

analyzed: thams cad 'dis ni sel bar byed //

analyzed: ces pa gsal ba la sogs pa 'dis ni gang zhig mi gsal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / rtog pa sel bar byed do //
translated: This clarity and so forth excludes that which is unclear, painful, and conceptual.

analyzed: 'o na 'di'i gleng gzhi'ang gang yin zhe na / gang zhig gsang ba'i yi ge la //
translated: What, then, is the nidƒÅna of this [tantra]?üîΩThe one who, having been roused from the time

analyzed: mthong med dus las bslang gyur nas //

original: yi ge rang bzhin med gsungs pa //
analyzed: yi ge rang bzhin med gsungs pa //

original: 'di ni bzhi pa'i gleng gzhi yin //
analyzed: 'di ni bzhi pa'i gleng gzhi yin //
translated: is the nidƒÅna of the fourth.

original: zhes pa / gang gi 'khor na gnas pa gang zhig gis //
analyzed: zhes pa / gang gi 'khor na gnas pa gang zhig gis //
translated: The one who dwells in the retinue of the one

analyzed: rang byung yi ge mthong ba'i skal ba med //
translated: who does not have the good fortune to see the self-originated syllables,

analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang bcas nas dus pa dang / rigs drug pa rdo rje 'chang gis brgyal ba bslang ste /
translated: Thus he spoke and fainted.

analyzed: yi ge thams cad dben pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / zhi ba nyid dang / gya nom pa nyid la sogs pa bstan pa ni gleng gzhi'o //
translated: Then Vajradhara of the six families revived him and taught him the emptiness of all letters, their emptiness, peace, and so forth.

original: gnas kyang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gnas kyang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the place?

original: mi rtog rtog bral 'dus ma byas //
analyzed: mi rtog rtog bral 'dus ma byas //
translated: Nonconceptual, free from conceptuality, uncompounded,

original: rgyal ba thams cad rten phyir gnas //
analyzed: rgyal ba thams cad rten phyir gnas //
translated: the place of all victors.

analyzed: zhes pa chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'di la gang dang gang gis brten par bya ba yin pas gnas su shes par bya'o //
translated: Since this natural purity of all phenomena is to be relied upon by anyone, it should be known as the place.

original: de'i dus kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de'i dus kyang gang zhe na /
translated: What is the time?

original: blang dor med pa dus kyi mchog //
analyzed: blang dor med pa dus kyi mchog //

original: sngon med phyis med gdod nas byung //
analyzed: sngon med phyis med gdod nas byung //
translated: It is primordially arisen, not before and not after.

analyzed: zhes pa chos thams cad gcig dang du ma dang bral ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa gang gis rtogs pa de ni 'das pa'i dus kyang mi dmigs /
translated: Whoever realizes the natural purity of all phenomena, free from one and many, does not observe a past time.

original: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus mi dmigs /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus mi dmigs /

original: dus gsum po blang ba ma yin //
analyzed: dus gsum po blang ba ma yin //
translated: The three times are not accepted,

original: spang ba ma yin /
analyzed: spang ba ma yin /
translated: not rejected,

analyzed: gnyis ka ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i dus so //
translated: and not both. This is the correct time.

original: gang @223a * //
analyzed: gang @223a * //
translated: By whom,

analyzed: gis bde ster slob dpon mchog / ces pa ni gang la gang gis bde ba ster ba 'di ni slob dpon te klu sgrub bzhin no //

analyzed: mi rtog pa'i shes pas kyang gang zhig gi rags pa dang phra ba'i rtog pa bzlog nas des bde ba thob par byed pa'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: By non-conceptual knowledge, by what is the coarse and subtle conceptualization of someone stopped, and by that is happiness obtained? For that reason, it is said thus.

original: ci'i phyir slob mar brtag ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir slob mar brtag ce na /

original: kun gyi thugs kyi sras gyur phyir //
analyzed: kun gyi thugs kyi sras gyur phyir //
translated: Because it becomes the heart-son of all,

original: bslab par bya ba'i slob ma yin //
analyzed: bslab par bya ba'i slob ma yin //
translated: it is the disciple to be trained.

original: zhes pa gang la ye shes dri ma med pa yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa gang la ye shes dri ma med pa yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras yin te /
translated: That in which stainless pristine consciousness exists is the son of all Tathagatas,

original: rdo rje chos bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje chos bzhin no //
translated: like Vajradharma.

original: 'di'i rgyu'ang gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'i rgyu'ang gang zhig yin zhe na /

original: ting 'dzin shes rab khyad par can //
analyzed: ting 'dzin shes rab khyad par can //

original: mi rtog shes pa bskyed phyir rgyu //
analyzed: mi rtog shes pa bskyed phyir rgyu //
translated: The cause of the generation of non-conceptual intuition is the special meditative concentration and wisdom.

original: zhes pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained above.

original: dkyil 'khor yang gang zhig yin zhe na /üîΩsnying po len par byed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor yang gang zhig yin zhe na / snying po len par byed pa'i phyir //
translated: What is the mandala?

original: ye shes rgyur bcas dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: ye shes rgyur bcas dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala is the intuition together with its cause, because it takes up the essence.

original: zhes pa snying po ni sangs rgyas kyi sku dang ye shes te 'dis len par byed pa'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //üîΩgang gis sngon du gyur pa yis //
analyzed: zhes pa snying po ni sangs rgyas kyi sku dang ye shes te 'dis len par byed pa'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o // gang gis sngon du gyur pa yis //

original: sbyor ba 'di ru zhugs pa yin //
analyzed: sbyor ba 'di ru zhugs pa yin //
translated: has previously entered the mandala.

original: zhes pa gang gis rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes khong du chud pa de ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'o //üîΩgang gis zab pa'i man ngag rnams //
analyzed: zhes pa gang gis rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes khong du chud pa de ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'o // gang gis zab pa'i man ngag rnams //
translated: He who has understood the intuition free from all conceptualization has entered the mandala.üîΩHe who has listened to, reflected on, and meditated on

original: mnyan pa dang ni bsam pa dang // bsgom pa yi ni rim gyis kyang //
analyzed: mnyan pa dang ni bsam pa dang // bsgom pa yi ni rim gyis kyang //
translated: the profound instructions

original: bla med dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug //
analyzed: bla med dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug //
translated: has entered the mandala of the unexcelled.

original: ces pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is an intermediate verse.

original: 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba 'ang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba 'ang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the preliminary practice for this?üîΩThe three initiations together with the esoteric instructions

original: dbang gsum man ngag dang bcas dang // slob pa sngon du 'gro ba yin //
analyzed: dbang gsum man ngag dang bcas dang // slob pa sngon du 'gro ba yin //
translated: are the preliminary practice.

original: zhes pa bum pa dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang / de dang 'brel ba'i man ngag ni spyi'i sngon du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa bum pa dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang / de dang 'brel ba'i man ngag ni spyi'i sngon du 'gro ba'o //
